markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Imprint Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=2003)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 247 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 74

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You project psychic vibrations onto the target object, imprinting it with a short message or emotional theme of your design. This imprinted sensation is revealed to a creature who casts [_object reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=705) on the target object, replacing any emotional events the item was present for. If the object is in the area of a [_retrocognition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1652) spell, the imprinted messages appear as major events in the timeline, but they don't interfere with any other visions.

 If the object is targeted with [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1646) of a higher spell rank than _imprint message_, the caster learns that the object has been magically modified. When you Cast this Spell, any prior vibrations placed on an object by previous castings of _imprint message_ fade.
name: Imprint Message

</summary>

summary_markdown: Put a false psychic imprint in an object.
text: Imprint Message Two Actions Source Player Core 2 pg. 247 1.1 , Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn pg. 74 Tradition Occult Range touch Target 1 object --- You project psychic vibrations onto the target object, imprinting it with a short message or emotional theme of your design. This imprinted sensation is revealed to a creature who casts object reading on the target object, replacing any emotional events the item was present for. If the object is in the area of a retrocognition spell, the imprinted messages appear as major events in the timeline, but they don't interfere with any other visions. If the object is targeted with read aura of a higher spell rank than imprint message , the caster learns that the object has been magically modified. When you Cast this Spell, any prior vibrations placed on an object by previous castings of imprint message fade.
